item.title: "Open Access" by Peter Suber
item.description:
Well, a year has rolled around, and so ‘Open Access’ by Peter Suber is now… open access.

 

Review, discussion, and updated link to content by Stephen Curry: http://occamstypewriter.org/scurry/2012/07/05/open-access-by-peter-suber/
